;

;Director Li Mo;(Interviewed (Photo courtesy of the author);

;

;In a Douban review of the TV series "Apocalypse of Acting", Li Mo, the director of the show, wrote that he has "professionally acted as an actor for 30 years."

;

;In junior high school, he couldn't stand the smell of sweat in the boys' dormitory, so he sprayed on a Saint Laurent women's perfume, becoming the first person among his classmates to wear perfume (later he compromised for Nivea's because the smell was too strong) Walking beads of sweat). At the book rental shop in front of the school, he avoided Jin Yong, Gu Long, and Liang Yusheng, who were all reading, and picked up a copy of Freud's "Introduction to Psychoanalysis." Later, because I despised popular philosophy, I read a few pages of Hegel's "Little Logic". He has studied Shakespeare's sonnets and pondered the differences between ancient and modern English expressions. After watching "007", he went to the bar to imitate James Bond and order a Martini. He was once a professional music student, playing the guqin since elementary school. He gained his rock and roll enlightenment from Radiohead's "Ok, Computer" and has been playing in the band for more than ten years. He mainly plays guitar, plays drums, is the lead singer, does programming, and plays bass. He was admitted to the Conservatory of Music, dropped out after one year and was admitted to the Beijing Film Academy. He struggled for nearly ten years to become a director.

;

;This all explains his excitement when he saw the novel "The Pretender Revelation". "Closing the book, I thought, probably no one is better at filming this than me. Clear yet euphemistic, hypocritical yet sincere, timid yet brave."

;

;Recently, the TV series "Pretend", adapted from the novel of the same name, "Revelations" was broadcast, with a Douban score of 8.1, becoming his third Douban score of 8 after "I'm Very Good in a Foreign Country" (2021, a score of 8.1) and "Sanyue Has a New Job" (2022, a score of 8.4) The above works. For current domestic TV drama directors, this achievement is impressive enough.

;

;;

;

;Li Mo plays a policeman in "I'm Very Good in a Foreign Country";(provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;Three dramas in three years, all focusing on the plight of contemporary urban youth. "I'm Good in a Foreign Country" tells the story of strangers in a big city who experience various tests in life, career, and relationships while wandering. In "Sanyue Has a New Job", the protagonist Zhao Sanyue accidentally works as a makeup artist in a funeral parlor, witnessing the life and death of the deceased, and reflecting the portraits of all living beings. The story of "Apocalypse of Pretending" takes place in Beijing CBD. Investment banking elite Xu Ziquan and lawyer Tang Ying meet. While coping with the pressure of work, they try their best to maintain an elegant urban life. From testing each other to gradually letting go of their guard, they Come together.

;

;Li Mo, who was born in 1988, experienced similar difficulties. After graduating from college, he played the piano, made movies, wrote novels, became a teacher, and almost took the Ph.D. exam, saying that he "wanted everything." Finally, under the guidance of his mentor, he carefully read the "Heart Sutra" and "Diamond Sutra", calmed down to get inspiration from religion, and was more sure of the answer in his heart: "I just want to do the work of expression and creation. I You can experience a different life." Being a director is his current way of expression.

;

;;

;

;Stills of "The Apocalypse"

;

;Li Mo's WeChat name is Mephisto (Mephisto), and his WeChat signature is: "I can give you everything you want, but you just pay yourself." (I can give you everything you want, but you have to pay your soul.) They come from the poetic drama "Faust" created by the German writer Johann Wolfgang von Goethe .

;

;In the book, Faust is getting old, studying in a dark study for half his life, and feels extremely tired. At this time, the demon Mephisto comes and lures him to sign an agreement: to satisfy everything he had during his lifetime. Asked to take his soul until his death. This is also a bet between Mephisto and God. In pursuit of truth, Faust went through many hardships and traveled all the paths that humans have pursued. He often failed and sank, but he did not give up and finally gained salvation. Li Mo likes this work very much and has read it many times. He feels that Faust and Mephisto are the two sides of human beings. "As people grow up, the soul seems to be less and less important. I wrote that sentence in my signature, hoping that all the people I know will think of this when they see it: If it is not so important, it will be in you. If you don’t even explore it, how about selling your soul? After Faust experienced everything, he found that the soul is the most important. This is the meaning of Mephisto. I want to be a Mephisto by my side People, remind everyone, remind me, give you everything, sell your soul, okay?"

;

;;

;

;Director Li Mo; (Provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;;;Powerlessness;;is the most;;ability;;The dilemma of urbanites that makes me empathize;——Conversation with Li Mo;

;

;Positive expression of "I love you"

;

;;Southern People Weekly ：;;In "The Apocalypse of Pretending", Xu Ziquan wrote a perfume name for Tang Ying, but it was not the one in the original work One. There are many similar details in the play. Did you change these? Why do we need to change this? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;The model in the original book has been discontinued. A lot of the modifications were made in the hope that it would become closer to the present. I predict that people will be sensitive to these things. For example, the Le Labo balm that Xu Ziquan used on the plane at the beginning of the play was not mentioned in the original work. That is one of my personal favorites. I find it very convenient and can take it with me on the plane at any time. Later I learned that that one had also been discontinued, but it was still in production when I was writing the script. I want to change the TV series to be closer to some of my life (actual situations), and the wine used in it is also the same. ;

;

;How the props are presented is part of the expression. This is not about selling goods. I think people like him probably use such things.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Why is there a proposal scene in the ending? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;Many lines are carried over from the book, but the act of proposing is not in the book. Because the play is over, I hope to give the audience a sense of closure, a ceremonial explanation. He proposed, not got married. I don't think they got married. ;

;

;There is a big difference between proposing and getting married. Proposing means my determination and intention. I want to be with you forever. I didn’t say we’d grow old together, but I wanted to build our own world with you. I know that we may encounter many difficulties after entering marriage, but I believe that you and I have the ability to live our lives the way we want. This is the determination I want to say.

;

;Idealism and materialism are not contradictory. I thought so in my heart. I want to take some actions to prove it. When I have the financial resources, I will buy a diamond ring to express my love to my lover.

;

;I put such a scene in the ending just to tell the audience that Xu Ziquan is a sincere person. Many viewers thought he was handsome, his butt was perky, he owned a car and a house, and he was a financial man... so they concluded that this (proposal) was not true, that this love was a fairy tale, and that he could not like a third-year lawyer so much. ——It looks like that. But love is not a business. There is no reason to fall in love with someone. I just love you.

;

;By the time of the final proposal, Xu Ziquan's view of love had changed. He was willing to build "our world" with Tang Ying, and was willing to turn one person's life into "our two lives." , I think this is the value and meaning of marriage proposal.

;

;I am willing to advocate the positive expression of I love you and my willingness in my plays.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Is this also your view on love? This positive expression and belief? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;I keep exploring what love is before I can believe in it. I believe love begins when I meet my wife. A large part of Xu Ziquan is my projection. He didn't think there was such a person in the world who could support me, who could see the worst in me and still love me, who could tolerate me and understand me. ;

;

;Tang Ying is the one who talks about love and understands love. Xu Ziquan understands teasing and skills. He knows how to make people like him. I like the scene in the bathroom the most. When Xu Ziquan was very bad, Tang Ying did not criticize him for being bad, but told him: You should tell me that you are not in a good state, you should share with me, and you should tell him that you are not in good condition. Show me your good side, don't worry, I can catch it, I think you are the best, you don't even know how good you are. This is a moment that I have experienced in my life, which makes me feel that I am loved, wrapped and supported by others. She made me feel that even though I was in such a bad state, I had such mood swings, my career was at a low point, and I couldn't see the future, she still didn't despise me, didn't measure me based on these, and didn't condemn me. She told me: I love you, you don’t even know how good you are.

;

;That moment made me understand what love is. It turns out that love is not about asking or giving, but about giving to each other. It means being able to see the worst side of him and still love him. This is the concept of love I want to tell you.

;

;;

;

;Stills of "The Pretender Apocalypse";;

;

;;No results will come if you don’t work hard None;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You said you like Han Dongjun (playing Xu Zi Quan), why does this feeling of fatigue touch you? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;I think the people in the circle I want to talk about are not worthy of saying they are tired or saying they have worked hard. They earn more money. In the context of the play, it is unacceptable for people who earn more money to suffer miserably. But when he truly comes into contact with the lives of these people and their difficulties, he cannot tell others that he is tired, miserable, or unhappy. ;

;

;You work in CBD, you are so busy, you were admitted to Peking University and Tsinghua University, you graduated from the fourth department of the fifth college, you went to the red circle institute, you went to SDIC, you did it Middle level, this life is already at its peak, what else do you want? What else are you miserable about?

;

;The worst thing about them is that they are not qualified to say they are miserable. There are seniors and juniors above them, and there are competitors beside them. If they make a mistake, they will be overthrown by others. No one can see the current situation of their lives. People think you deserve it, you deserve it. Why do you scream miserably? I can't even eat, I don't even scream miserably. You live in fine clothes and food every day, and go to luxurious occasions. Why are you so miserable? So I can't scream for them in this scene. I can only show their state. This is the feeling of fatigue. He can't express it. He can only smile and say to people, yes, you are right. This is how I feel about the people I know. Of course I don't think they are miserable either.

;

;If I want to talk about this group of people, I have to capture the most unique part of this group of people. For me, this part is that these people are very tired, but they can’t express it. .

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You filmed "I'm Good in a Foreign Country" and "Three "Joy Has a New Life" and "Pretending to Be Apocalypse" have received good reviews. What do you hope to express? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;They are all about urban life, and they are all about the plight of urban young people. ;

;

;I have been in trouble before, and maybe I am in trouble now. Difficulties will help people grow and hone themselves better.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Which dilemmas in the drama are you most sympathetic to? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;It’s the feeling of powerlessness at work. I clearly know that this thing can be done well, and I know how to do it well, but I just can't do it. At times like this, I feel very small in this city. I don’t know what the problem is, I’ve done everything I can, but things are still like this. This is the plight of urbanites that resonates most with me. ;

;

;But I want to tell you more, don’t give up in the face of this dilemma. Giving up is a kind of self-protection, because if you don’t have expectations, you won’t be disappointed or hurt. Whether facing work, love or family relationships, they all protect themselves in a way of withdrawal. It's fine if I'm alone, it's fine if I don't go up, it's fine if I lie down, and I still get paid.

;

;But even so, we should try. How terrible is failure? How terrible is falling out of love? Sometimes I feel that falling out of love is a very happy thing. I can feel many emotions that I can't usually feel. What a valuable life experience.

;

;You see, everything I talked about is quite idealistic. The material aspect is also important, but in fact you can live no matter what, and you don’t have to make a lot of money. The main thing is to figure out the standard of living you want, and if you do well in what you do today, it will be great.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Do you feel like you have gotten out of this predicament now? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;It’s hard to get out. I still feel powerless. Even if I feel I have done more than before, I still have things to do. Less than. The longer I work, the more powerless I feel. There are very few things that people can control. The director seems to have quite a lot of power and can decide many things, but I can't decide whether it will rain today or whether there will be a meeting tomorrow. ;

;

;When you feel powerless, it means you have not found the right way to get along with the world. Once you find it, you can feel the support the world gives you, rather than you and the world. opposition.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;When did you begin to feel that the world was giving you help and support? Not resistance? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;When I am not fighting with the world. ;

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;The powerlessness brought about by the current social structure The feeling may not be resolved. The reality is that our efforts may not necessarily bring positive returns, and individuals cannot achieve a change in their destiny just by working hard. Have you ever thought about this reality in your expression? ;

;

;;Li Mo: ;;I plan to talk to you about this in a later project. It is about a young man born in the 2000s who has been very ambitious since he was a child. , was admitted to a very good university in Beijing, and enrolled in 2019. After three years of the COVID-19 epidemic, I couldn’t find a job after graduation. I am currently writing a script and will film this project next year. ;

;

;I think now is an era of change, which is different from before. Everyone must accept the change. Every generation will face changes in the times, such as social fluctuations, wars, and changes, so there is no need to panic. You said that in the face of structural problems, people need to adjust their goals and self-positioning in the face of this era. It does not mean that the times have changed and I will not get the same results as in the previous era if I work hard, so I don't work hard. Efforts in this era will have results in this era. Without efforts, there will be no results. Working hard is not a choice, working hard is what you should do.

;

;Maybe when I finish filming the scene next year, I can bring some discussion to everyone. I want to tell everyone how to be down-to-earth in that scene. But I still want to tell you here, don’t give up. When you are lying down in this era, a group of people who are not lying down will take away the opportunity. This is the case in every era. The opportunities you give up will be taken away by others. If you work hard, you may find opportunities. Facing life positively is not a bad thing in any era.
